name: json-utils
description: A comprehensive web-based JSON utility tool

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist docs && mkdir -p dist docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-templates && webpack --mode production && cp -r dist/* docs/
scripts.build:analyze: npm run clean && npm run build-templates && webpack --mode production --analyze && cp -r dist/* docs/
scripts.dev: npm run build-templates && webpack serve --mode development
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp dist/index.html docs/ && cp dist/*.js docs/ && cp dist/*.css docs/
